function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in sewage samples from a hospital","Impact":"Potential risk of transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through sewage","Mitigation":"Implement strict disinfection measures for sewage and wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection equipment, viral culture testing","People":"Hospital staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Limitations in the study, including small sample size and lack of air sampling for SARS-CoV-2 RNA detection","Impact":"Inability to fully demonstrate the effectiveness of disinfection measures","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies with larger sample sizes and include air sampling","Technologies":"Advanced sampling and testing techniques","People":"Research team, public health authorities","Owner":"Research team, hospital management"}]}
